text: KAMA or Kama may refer to: * Korea Automobile Manufacturers Association * KAMA (AM), a radio station (750 AM) licensed to El Paso, Texas, United States * KAMA-FM, a radio station (104.9 FM) licensed to Deer Park, Texas, United States * Kama, a professional wrestling gimmick portrayed by Charles Wright (wrestler) * the ICAO code for Rick Husband Amarillo International Airport * Kama, Sanskrit word for pleasure.
title: KAMA
